00012 Normalization::Normalization(char *HistogramDirectoryName, int threshold = 350) :
00013   FillHistBase(HistogramDirectoryName), fNMuons(0), fThreshold(threshold) {
00014 
00015   N_MU = 0;
00016 
00017   hNumberOfMuons = new TH1F("hNumberOfMuons", "hNumberOfMuons", 1,0,1);
00018 
00019   gDirectory->cd("/");

00025 int Normalization::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup) {
00026 
00027   // Make sure no other module changed N_MU
00028   if (N_MU != fNMuons) {
00029     std::cout << "ERROR: Normalization::N_MU changed unexpectadly!" << std::endl;
00030     return -1;
00031   }
00032   fNMuons = 0;
00033 
00034   // Find the bankname associated with muSc
00035   std::string bankname = "";
00036   std::map<std::string, std::string>& B2D = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00037   static std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator iBank;
00038   for (iBank = B2D.begin(); iBank != B2D.end(); ++iBank) {
00039     if (iBank->second == "muSc") {
00040       bankname = iBank->first;
00041       break;
00042     }
00043   }
00044 
00045   // Make certain we found muSc
00046   if (bankname == "") {
00047     std::cout << "Warning: Could not find muSc pulses! (TPulseIsland* vector not found, N_MU set to zero)" << std::endl;
00048     Normalization::N_MU = 0;
00049     return 0;
00050   }
00051 
00052   // Count the muons
00053   std::vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulses = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.at(bankname);
00054   static std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator iPulse;
00055   for (iPulse = pulses.begin(); iPulse != pulses.end(); ++iPulse)
00056     if (IsOverThreshold(iPulse))
00057       ++fNMuons;
00058 
00059   N_MU = fNMuons;
00060   hNumberOfMuons->Fill("muons", fNMuons);
00061 
00062   return 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool Normalization::IsOverThreshold(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator& pulse) {
00066 
00067   std::vector<int> samples = (*pulse)->GetSamples();
00068   static std::vector<int>::iterator iSample;
00069   for (iSample = samples.begin(); iSample != samples.end(); ++iSample)
00070     if (*iSample > fThreshold)
00071       return true;
00072   
00073   return false;
00074 }
00075 
00076 unsigned int Normalization::GetMuonCount() {
00077   return N_MU;
00078 }

00080 unsigned int Normalization::N_MU = 0;
